results.description: Gather your documents — you’ll need a valid driver’s license, your vehicle’s details (make, model, year, and vehicle identification number) and banking information. results.title: Do I Need Comprehensive Car Insurance? - State Farm®
results.description: Overview: Deciding whether you need comprehensive car insurance means looking beyond what’s required by law. Comprehensive coverage helps pay for damage to your car caused by non-collision events like theft, vandalism, weather damage or animal strikes. Whether this extra protection is worth it depends on your vehicle’s value, local risks, budget and your comfort with unexpected expenses.
